pages.text: The $(thing)Flamespiral Flower$() represents the pinnacle of fire-attuned botanical magic, with an intricate spiral pattern of petals that contain swirling flames that never consume the plant itself.$(br2)This advanced magical flower generates remarkable heat in a controlled, focused pattern.

$(bold)Cultivation Notes:$()$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil infused with Flame Essence$(br)- Thrives in hot environments$(br)- Growth accelerated by nearby lava or fire$(br)- When mature, emits focused heat in a specific direction rather than radiating it outward

pages.title: Creating Flamespiral
pages.text: Flamespiral can be created through specialized magical processes that tame and control raw fire magic. The resulting plant maintains disciplined, spiraling flame patterns.

pages.title: Bloom Properties
pages.text: Harvested Flamespiral blooms continue to generate intense heat in a controlled pattern. Unlike the common Flame Flower which produces wild, unpredictable fire energy, the Flamespiral creates disciplined, directed heat.

pages.title: Advanced Applications
pages.text: $(li)Focused heat for magical forging and precision metalwork$(li)Controlled burning and targeted incineration without spread$(li)Heat-based wards and protective barriers$(li)Enchanting items with advanced fire resistance properties$(li)Precision fire-based offensive magic$(br2)$(italic)The essence is particularly dangerous in untrained hands - handle with extreme caution and proper fire protection.$()
